org.cleverbus.test.route
Class TestWsUriBuilder

java.lang.Object
  org.cleverbus.test.route.TestWsUriBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
WebServiceUriBuilder
public class TestWsUriBuilder
extends Object
implements WebServiceUriBuilder

Implementation of WebServiceUriBuilder for using in tests. "direct" component is used instead of specific web service implementation, e.g. "spring-ws". Advantage is that it's no further needed to use "advice" for changing input route URI.

Direct URI has the following format: "direct:inWS_"/"direct:outWS_" + local part of the request qName.

Example of using in test: 

  Produce(uri = TestWsUriBuilder.URI_WS_IN + "syncHelloRequest")
    private ProducerTemplate producer;

Author:
Petr Juza

Method Detail

getOutWsUri

public String getOutWsUri(String connectionUri,
                          String messageSenderRef,
                          String soapAction)
Description copied from interface: WebServiceUriBuilder
Constructs a "to" URI for sending WS messages to external systems, i.e., Camel Web Service Endpoint URI for contacting an external system via SOAP 1.1.

Specified by:
getOutWsUri in interface WebServiceUriBuilder
Parameters:
connectionUri - the URI to connect to the external system, e.g.: http://localhost:8080/vfmock/ws/mm7
messageSenderRef - the message sender ref (bean id/name in Spring context)
soapAction - the SOAP action to be invoked, can be null for implicit handling of SOAP messages by the external system
Returns:
the Camel Endpoint URI for producing (sending via To) SOAP messages to external system

getInWsUri

public String getInWsUri(QName qName,
                         String endpointMappingRef,
                         @Nullable

Description copied from interface: WebServiceUriBuilder
